description: Automate file storage operations with Google Cloud Storage. Upload, download, manage buckets, set permissions, and monitor changes with real-time triggers.

actions.name: clone_object
actions.description: Copy / clone an object (file) to a new location (same or different bucket), optionally overriding metadata. Perfect for duplicating files as backup or version.

actions.name: create_bucket_acl
actions.description: Add an ACL entry at bucket level. Perfect for granting permission to manage the bucket.

actions.name: create_bucket_default_object_acl
actions.description: Set default ACLs for new objects added to a bucket. Perfect for automatically assigning permissions to new uploads.

actions.name: create_bucket
actions.description: Create a new bucket in a specified location/configuration. Perfect for automating storage provisioning for new projects.

actions.name: create_object_acl
actions.description: Add an ACL entry to an object (grant a permission). Perfect for granting read/write access to a user or group.

actions.name: delete_bucket_acl
actions.description: Remove an ACL entry from a bucket. Perfect for revoking access for a user or group.

actions.name: delete_bucket_default_object_acl
actions.description: Remove default ACL settings from a bucket. Perfect for reverting to default behavior.

actions.name: delete_empty_bucket
actions.description: Clean up unused buckets by deleting them if they contain no live objects.

actions.name: delete_object_acl
actions.description: Remove an ACL entry from an object. Perfect for revoking access for a user.

actions.name: delete_object
actions.description: Permanently delete a specific object. Perfect for removing obsolete files.

actions.name: search_buckets
actions.description: Search buckets by name. Perfect for finding buckets in your project.

actions.name: search_objects
actions.description: Search objects by criteria. Perfect for finding files in your bucket.

triggers.name: new_object_created
triggers.description: Triggers when a new object is created in a bucket

triggers.name: object_updated
triggers.description: Triggers when an existing object is updated in a bucket
